CustomField.description: Logical expressions which can be applied to Mission Criteria. The expressions available are: "All" (it meets all the established criteria); "Any" (it meets at least one established Criterion) and "Custom" (it enables creating a formula based on the established criteria. E.g. ((1 AND 2) OR 3).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Logical expressions which can be applied to Mission Criteria: "All" (it meets all the established criteria); "Any" (it meets at least one Criterion) and "Custom" (it enables creating a formula based on the established criteria. E.g. ((1 AND 2) OR 3).
CustomField.label: Match Criteria
